pkgmetadata.longdescription: pycipher========Common classical ciphers implemented in Python.Documentation is available at http://pycipher.readthedocs.io/en/master/ .Install-------:: pip install git+git://github.com/jameslyons/pycipherExample usage-------------:: >>> from pycipher import ADFGVX >>> adfgvx = ADFGVX(key='PH0QG64MEA1YL2NOFDXKR3CVS5ZW7BJ9UTI8', keyword='GERMAN') >>> adfgvx.encipher("Hello world!") 'FVFDAGXAFFFFGFAGADFG' >>> adfgvx.decipher(_) 'HELLOWORLD'Feedback--------The code is hosted on GitHub: https://github.com/jameslyons/pycipherIf you find any bugs make an issue or create a pull request.To run the test suite:: python setup.py test
